public String getParameter(String parameter)
Get parameter out of the parameterMap. If there is more than one parameter value related to this parameter then this will return the first value.

removeParameter

public void removeParameter(String parameter)
Remove specific parameter from the Registry. If the parameter starts with a value in the Registry it will be removed.
